definitions: Made a slight bow with the head, as in assent, greeting, or command.
Let one's head fall forward when drowsy or asleep.
Made a slight, quick inclination of the head.
Showed agreement or understanding by moving the head down and then up.
examples: He nodded off during the lecture.
The teacher nodded for them to begin.
He nodded his head to the music.
The old man nodded a greeting.
